Software name:                           Micro-ecc
Brief:                                   A small and fast ECDH and ECDSA implementation for 8-bit, 32-bit, and 64-bit processors.
Path:                                    mcu\middleware\third_party\micro_ecc
Category:                                Open source software(OSS)
Software maker:                          kmackay
OSS download link:                       https://github.com/kmackay/micro-ecc
License:                                 BSD 2-Clause "Simplified"
Evidence of license agreement:           https://github.com/kmackay/micro-ecc/blob/master/LICENSE.txt
Version:                                 1.0
